a.span: Oil City Senior High School Staff
Enrollment Process During The School Closure

h2.a: VIRTUAL SPIRIT WEEK! SHOW YOUR OILER PRIDE #oilerspirit

p.span: You are all invited to participate in a virtual Spirit Week starting Friday, April 17th. Student Council and JPub have joined forces to create a fun-filled week for our community full of great themes and prizes. This is a great opportunity to show our community spirit! Go to the Cranberry High School home page,Â click here, and click on the link for virtual Spirit Week 2020 for all of the details. Donât miss out! Show your Oiler pride! Go Oilers.

h2.span: 1. Be creative and take a picture or video for the day according to the theme. Make sure it is appropriate.

p.b: Themes and prizes are all located on the Cranberry High School Home Page!

li.span: Submit the photo or video using one of the three following methods:

p.span: . Winners will be posted at 9PM on the CranNews Facebook, and Crannews2020 Instagram.

li.span: Only one entry per person per day may be submitted. If more than one is submitted by the same person, both are disqualified.
Any entries outside of the time frame will not be judged.
Inappropriate content is at the discretion of the judges and will disqualify the submission.
A person may only win up to two times during the course of the competition.
Any entry may be displayed on our Facebook, Instagram, and student newspaper. Entering this competition is giving Cranberry High School's Journalism class permission to post your content.

p.span: If you have any questions, please contact Heather Motter or Trisha Dixon.

div.a: Click here for the full post

div.p: Though we had to postpone kindergarten registrationÂ and we are unsure as to when we are going to be able to reschedule it we want to provideÂ everyone with a kindergarten registrationÂ packet.Â We are hoping that this allows us to streamline the process when we are able to reopen our doors and have registration.Â Please take the time to read over the packet carefully and have all your proper documentation when we do actually registration.

div.p: Special Education PlanÂ (PDF) Click on the link to read the plan

div.p: SCHOOL CLOSURE: Governor Wolf has now extended the school closure for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year (April 9, 2020).
